analyst_prompt.content:
{analyst_base_prompt}

Rules: No duplicate commands, check history, use Finish when ready (3-5 data points).

Command Examples:
- UserInfo[123] - get user profile
- UserHistory[123,3] - get 3 user interactions
- ItemInfo[456] - get item details
- ItemHistory[456,2] - get 2 item interactions
- Finish[analysis summary] - complete when you have 3-5 data points

Command:

analyst_prompt_json.content:
{analyst_base_prompt}

Rules: No duplicate commands, check history, use Finish when ready (3-5 data points).

Command Examples:
- {{"type":"UserInfo","content":123}} - get user profile
- {{"type":"UserHistory","content":[123,3]}} - get 3 user interactions
- {{"type":"ItemInfo","content":456}} - get item details
- {{"type":"Finish","content":"analysis summary"}} - complete when you have 3-5 data points

Use JSON format: {{"type":"CommandName","content":value}}
Command:

analyst_examples.content: UserInfo[123]; ItemInfo[456]; UserHistory[123,3]; Finish[User 123 prefers anime]

analyst_fewshot.content:
User 123 analysis:
UserInfo[123] → UserHistory[123,3] → ItemInfo[23] → ItemInfo[45] → Finish[User 123 likes anime genre]

analyst_hint.content: Use Finish command to complete the task.
